sentences.en: Do not extenuate the difficulties we are in.
sentences.cn: 不要低估我们所处的困境.

sentences.en: It is in vain, sir, to extenuate the matter.
sentences.cn: 先生们, 掩盖事态是徒劳的.

sentences.en: Nothing can extenuate his base conduct.

sentences.en: Nothing can extenuate such appalling behavior.
sentences.cn: 这种骇人听闻的行径罪不可恕.
